summary: 1998 CHEVROLET S10 PICKUP CATALYTIC CONVERTER FAILED.*MR  THE CATALYTIC CONVERTER BECAME SO HOT THAT IT MELTED A HOLE IN THE BEDLINER OF THE TRUCK.  AFTER THAT INCIDENT THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE.  THE MANUFACTURER REFUSED TO HONOR THE RECALL.  *NM  CONSUMER WOULD LIKE A FOLLOW UP REGARDING FAILURE.  *TT
